title: The Magic billabong
creator_credit: Garry Gibson and Barbara Graham Productions
brief_description: Featuring koalas, kangaroos, echidnas and other Australian wildlife in their natural habitat. Ann Patchett presents information, songs, magic, games, counting and camping with Kookie and the Gumnut Babies, plus story reading from award winning children’s books including “Possum magic” as well as plenty of ideas for exciting things to do.
